revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Ready.
Commit - lines 15 and 32 => <:μίαν|reg|μία:>
Vote - AcceptText - Fine -- note Nick's comments

Vote - AcceptText - The correction to δημ(οσίων) in lines 2 and 29 has already been proposed in P.Fay. 81 introd. (p. 209), which should replace "PN N. Reggiani ...". This resolution is generally accepted (e.g. SB XXII 15707.5 ) δημ(οσίων) means still remains debatable; contrast ZPE 99 (1993) 73 n. 2 with P.Louvre I 43.11 n. || lin4 ought to be Φιλαδέλφ[ου] || lin5 |reg| does not display well. — Voting now to move things ahead.

Submit - Fixed the BL addition of ll. 1-7 and updated the line numbering accordingly. The correct reference for the reading of ll. 1-7, which were left untranscribed by the ed.pr., is to BL 2.2, p. 80 (= Hombert, Aeg. 3, 1922, 354) and not to BL 1, p. 249.
Regularized iotacism at ll. 8, 18, 28.
Corrected the abbreviation for δημ(οσίων) at ll. 9 & 29 according to parallel sitologos-receipts (e.g. P.Louvre 1.43). The phrase ὑπὲρ δημοσίων commonly points to one of the two main rent categories dealt with by the sitologoi: see also e.g. P.Tebt.2.368,5 ὑπὲρ δ[η(μοσίων) τῆς] αὐτῆς κώ(μης); SB 20.14682,3 (ὑπὲρ) δημ(οσίων) τῆ(ς) πόλ̣(εως). The other rent categort is ὑπὲρ κατοίκων, cf. e.g. SB 16.12684,8-9 ὑπ(ὲρ) [Ἔ]ξω Ψε̣ῦ̣ρ̣ κατ̣οί̣κ̣(ων).In the administrative terminology they are regularly expressed in the genitive plural.
Vote - ReturnToSender - This cannot be accepted without a more detailed explanation why the genitive plural is to be preferred.
Vote - ReturnToSender - The word order seems to be impossible, cf. the given examples.

entered correct form δημ(οσίων) at ll. 2 & 22 from comparison with other similar documents (see e.g. P.Tebt.2.368,5 ὑπὲρ δ[η(μοσίων) τῆς] αὐτῆς κώ(μης); SB 20.14682,3 (ὑπὲρ) δημ(οσίων) τῆ(ς) πόλ̣(εως); SB 16.12684,8-9 ὑπ(ὲρ) [Ἔ]ξω Ψε̣ῦ̣ρ̣ κατ̣οί̣κ̣(ων))

Submit - entered correct form δημ(οσίων) at ll. 2 & 22 from comparison with other similar documents (see e.g. P.Tebt.2.368,5 ὑπὲρ δ[η(μοσίων) τῆς] αὐτῆς κώ(μης); SB 20.14682,3 (ὑπὲρ) δημ(οσίων) τῆ(ς) πόλ̣(εως); SB 16.12684,8-9 ὑπ(ὲρ) [Ἔ]ξω Ψε̣ῦ̣ρ̣ κατ̣οί̣κ̣(ων))

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - This should be entered as <:(δημ(οσίων))=PN U. Yiftach-Firanko|ed|(δημ(οσίῳ)):>. Instead of writing "from comparation with other similar registers (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko)" => from comparison with other similar registers ** e.g. give some references here, so that editors can look at them to make a decision ** (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko). Thank you very much.
Entered the correct form (δημ(οσίῳν)) in lin. 2 & 22, from comparation with other similar registers (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko)
Submit - Entered the correct form (δημ(οσίῳν)) in lin. 2 & 22, from comparation with other similar registers (suggestion by Uri Yiftach-Firanko)
rationalized languages in langUsage
changed editor names to URIs
converted app type=BL|SoSOL to editorial
Third automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
changed type=inWord to break=no
Automatically updated revision description
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
updated markup for fractions (rend=tick)
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Added language la-Grek; tagged num rend=fraction
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
Automated split from transcoder files

div.p: Lines 1–7, left untranscribed in the first edition, have been entered from M. Hombert, Aegyptus 3 (1922) 354 (= BL 2.2, pp. 80–81).
